actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-592.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5566), authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5566 (Kennedy Center).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5566), authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
